column4: hello, i installed windows and messed up grub. i am trying to use the live cd to chroot into my linux install and fix grub. i am following this guide but i am a little confused can someone help me understand a couple things? http://karuppuswamy.com/wordpress/2010/06/02/how-to-chroot-to-ubuntu-using-live-cd-to-fix-grub-rescue-prompt/
: heh do you like crackerjak food?
i do but i actually got the idea of the name from a password cracker and i sometimes go by crackerhackz
